topic.title: Management Console Overview
topic.shortdesc: Welcome to the Eucalyptus Management Console Guide. The Eucalyptus Management Console is an easy to use web-based interface that allows you to manage your Eucalyptus cloud.

body.p: You can do many things with the Eucalyptus Management Console, including:

ul.li: Get a high-level overview of your cloud with the dashboard
Create and manage Auto Scaling groups
Create and manage Elastic Load Balancers
Manage your Amazon Web Services cloud
Create and manage IAM users and groups

section.title: What's In This Guide
section.p: This guide contains information on how to install and configure the Eucalyptus Management Console, as well as a section on how to navigate and use the screens and dialogs contained in the management console:

row.entry: Contains instructions on how to install the Eucalyptus Management Console.
Describes how to locate and configure the console configuration file, as well as each setting in the configuration file.

entry.xref: Working with the Eucalyptus Management Console

row.entry: Discusses how to get started using the Eucalyptus Management Console and how to navigate and use the screens and dialog boxes in the console.
